cards.title: Memorial
setup: Put {Memorial} into play, “A Day to Remember” side up. Search the villain deck for all Incident cards and select one at random. Put that Incident into play and remove the others from the game. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: When a non-Incident villain card would enter play, instead shuffle it into the villain deck and the non-hero target with the highest HP deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} projectile damage.
When a villain Incident leaves play, remove that Incident from the game.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are no villain Incidents in play, flip {Memorial}.
flippedGameplay: When {Memorial} flips to this side, search the villain deck for Causality Buffer and put it into play. Reveal cards from the villain deck until 3 Renowns are revealed. Put those Renowns into play. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck.
When a villain Renown enters play, move it next to a non-Renowned hero character target. If there are none, discard it and play the top card of the villain deck.

Whenever a villain target deals 2 or more damage to a Renowned target, activate the first effect in this list that hasn't been activated this turn:{BR}1) {Memorial} regains {H - 1} HP.{BR}2) One player discards a card.{BR}3) Reduce damage dealt to {Memorial} by 1 until the start of the villain turn.{BR}4) Destroy a non-character hero card.{BR}5) Destroy a hero Ongoing or Equipment card.{BR}6) Destroy the non-character non-villain target with the lowest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, {Memorial} deals the {H - 1} hero targets with the highest HP 3 projectile damage each.

openingLines.default: Well, ain't you a colorful bunch? Lemme see if I can fit you into my schedule...

cards.title: Air Like Molasses
body: {Memorial} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} energy damage. Until the start of the villain turn, reduce damage dealt by that hero by 1 and increase damage dealt to that hero by 1.
cards.flavorText: What the-? How'd you get all the way over there?

cards.title: Causality Buffer
body: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: Century after century, the story repeats: a legendary figure dies, and the killer escapes without a scratch.

cards.title: Children of Night
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} infernal damage and {H - 2} psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: ... strategist, sorcerer and apprentice, martial arts legend, and whatever [b]that[/b] guy does...

cards.title: Chronoton Pulse
body: When this card enters or leaves play, destroy {H - 1} hero Ongoing and/or Equipment cards.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals itself 1 energy damage.
cards.flavorText: Well, I think we figured out how this guy leaves so little evidence.

cards.title: Due Respect
body: Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a Renown is revealed. Play it. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck.
{Memorial} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} melee damage.
cards.flavorText: He targets the extraordinary. War heroes, law enforcement, undefeated champions. People like all of you.

cards.title: Empty the Cylinder
body: Select the [b]Renowned[/b] target with the highest HP. If there are no [b]Renowned[/b] targets, select the hero target with the highest HP instead.
{Memorial} deals the selected target 2 irreducible projectile damage {H - 1} times.
cards.flavorText: Ow! Ow ow ow! Can't somebody take that thing away from him?

cards.title: Exemplar
body: Heroes in this play area are [b]Renowned.[/b] When this card enters play, {Memorial} deals this hero 2 projectile damage.
At the start of this play area's turn, this hero may use a power.
cards.flavorText: Huh. Thought you'd be taller. Statues do that, I guess.

cards.title: Fortress
body: Heroes in this play area are [b]Renowned.[/b] When this card enters play, {Memorial} deals this hero 2 projectile damage.
At the start of this play area's turn, this hero may regain 2 HP.
cards.flavorText: So the thing with the hundreds of little knife critters was true, huh?

cards.title: Genius
body: Heroes in this play area are [b]Renowned.[/b] When this card enters play, {Memorial} deals this hero 2 projectile damage.
At the start of this play area's turn, this hero's player may draw a card.
cards.flavorText: Always wondered if one day someone'd be expecting me. Figures it would be you.

cards.title: Living Thunderhead
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP {H - 1} sonic damage each.
At the start of the villain turn, destroy a hero Ongoing or Equipment card.
cards.flavorText: ... immortal warrior, space traveler, alien ambassador, Virtuoso, and self-professed fist of God...

cards.title: Marksman
body: Heroes in this play area are [b]Renowned.[/b] When this card enters play, {Memorial} deals this hero 2 projectile damage.
At the start of this play area's turn, this hero's player may increase the next damage dealt by this hero by 2.
cards.flavorText: Folks say she could take the wings off a fly at a thousand yards.

cards.title: Parasite Swarm
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each hero target 2 melee damage.
At the start of the villain turn, this card regains {H - 1} HP.
cards.flavorText: ... armored juggernaut, urban ninja, speedster, elementalist, and the ninth of the Parsons line...

cards.title: Polymath
body: Heroes in this play area are [b]Renowned.[/b] When this card enters play, {Memorial} deals this hero 2 projectile damage.
At the start of this play area's turn, this hero's player may discard a card to play an Ongoing or Equipment card.
cards.flavorText: You wouldn't believe how many people claim to have studied with you. 'Course, I don't believe them either.

cards.title: Sedative Payload
body: When {Memorial} deals 2 or more damage to a target, reduce the next damage dealt by that target by 2.
cards.flavorText: This primitive technology is... no match for... ~*

cards.title: Split Second Shot
body: {Memorial} deals the {H - 1} hero targets with the highest HP 2 irreducible projectile damage each.
Play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: The earlier you look, the easier he is to spot. No one knew what a pistol was when he shot Alexander the Great.

cards.title: Thermite Launcher
body: When this card enters play, destroy all non-target environment cards.
At the end of the villain turn, {Memorial} deals each non-villain target 1 irreducible fire damage.
cards.flavorText: How dare you! These are irreplaceable antiquities!

cards.title: Weapons Portal
body: Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until a Device is revealed. Play it. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck.
{Memorial} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} fire damage.
cards.flavorText: His victims are mourned, studied, commemmorated. Meanwhile, he vanishes from history, as if hiding in their shadow.

cards.title: Whirlwind
body: Heroes in this play area are [b]Renowned.[/b] When this card enters play, {Memorial} deals this hero 2 projectile damage.
At the start of this play area's turn, this hero may deal 1 target 2 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Mostly I come alone for the challenge. This time, I doubt an army would help.
